programme.title: Pag-Ibig Ko Sa Iyo'y Totoo
programme.desc: A police officer lost his partner and girlfriend on the job. To forget the tragedy, he accepted the offer to become the bodyguard of a rich, young singing star whose father he has rescued from kidnappers.

programme.title: Epifanio ang Bilas Ko
programme.desc: This merry romp spoofs the highly successful "Epimaco Velasco Story" but instead of a heroic NBI detective with a bumbling private eye in the lead, Epifanio and his brother-in-law heads a detective and security agency.

programme.title: Oras-Oras, Araw-Araw
programme.desc: Jessa Rodriguez (Sharon Cuneta), a successful TV personality whose top rating show features ugly stories of poverty and hardships. She sympathizes with her subjects but it all ends there, until she meets one lady in a club.

programme.title: Love At First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae at Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: Pugante
programme.desc: Daniel (Dante Varona) is the best police officer the force has. He is assigned to track down five hardened criminals who have escaped from prison. But he needs the help of "Mandong Lundag" (Jess Lapid, Jr), a convicted thief and a former gangmate of the escaped convicts.

programme.title: Gloria, Gloria Labandera
programme.desc: Gloria is the pretty and super sexy laundry-woman who works for a rich young couple. It turns out that her male employer is sick and tired of his wife's negative ways, so he decides to use Gloria to rile her.

programme.title: Walang Karugtong Ang Nakaraan
programme.desc: A widower found a strong resemblance between his late wife and the tutor of his daughter. Naive and very much in love, she obeyed his wishes and only later realized that he was not really in love with her but only with a memory.

programme.title: Ang Lahat Ng Ito Pati Na Ang Langit
programme.desc: Movie Queen Susan Roces made a rare screen appearance as a famous dress designer, who adopted the illegitimate daughter of one of her models, Dina Bonnevie. The little girl became her only joy after she turned into a recluse when she lost her fiancÃ© to the same seemingly unstable Dina.

programme.title: Ex-Army
programme.desc: Movie Queen Susan Roces made a rare screen appearance as a famous dress designer, who adopted the illegitimate daughter of one of her models, Dina Bonnevie. The little girl became her only joy after she turned into a recluse when she lost her fiancÃ© to the same seemingly unstable Dina.

programme.title: Darna (Digitlly Enhanced)
programme.desc: Darna, the most beloved of Filipino superheroes, entered the era of the 90's as a quiet, bespectacled girl reporter. She defended the good against the many evil forces, which were lurking in the big city.

programme.title: Mahirap Maging Pogi (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Perding Pogi (Andrew E.) is sought after by every woman in their neighborhood. Running away from all the girls who are dying to be his wife, he decides to look for his cousin Dodong Boogie (Dennis Padilla) in Manila.

programme.title: Baby Paterno (Dugong Pulis)
programme.desc: Baby Paterno (Roi Vinzon) comes from a well to do family. He is a womanizer and a partygoer who always ends up in trouble. Later on, he proves to be a good law enforcer. He tries to uncover serious crimes only to find out that the head of the syndicate is his superior.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 17, Day 9 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Limited mobility can restrict blood flow, causing pressure injuries. To address them, Japanese experts are developing advanced bedding and other technologies.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers

programme.title: Journeys in Japan
programme.desc: Shizuka Anderson explores the 250-year history of the hidden Christians in Kumamoto and Nagasaki.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Filmmaker Soda Kazuhiro, whose latest work won the Best Movie Award at a film festival in 2024, tells us about the "observational" documentary style he has been championing for 20 years.

programme.title: Passing the Torch of Peace
programme.desc: The key to achieving peace is feeling the pain of others. It's an idea Hayashida Mitsuhiro picked up from hibakusha in his native Nagasaki, and one he tries to teach young visitors to his city.

programme.title: 1/2: People Who Don't Drink
programme.desc: 1 in 2 don't drink in Japan, where intense social drinking is normal. Through interviews of drinkers and non-drinkers we hear both sides, including a couple who went sober and opened a no-alcohol bar.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Doodles or Ukiyoe
programme.desc: A series of doodles by the famous artist Utagawa Kuniyoshi turn out to be carefully considered depictions of the kabuki actors of the day. What kind of artistic statement was he trying to make?

programme.desc: Learn Chef Rika's Japanese-style croquette, Korokke, a family recipe from her mother. She shares quick cooking tips and a simple dessert, coffee jelly with Kokuto, Japanese muscovado sugar.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batsonâ€™s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one wordâ€”SHAZAM!â€”this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heartâ€”inside a ripped, godlike bodyâ€”Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But heâ€™ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).
